name: Are you a Dog or a Wolf?
name_original: Are you a Dog or a Wolf?
description:
A frantic and hilarious two-player game where you can choose to be a shepard dog, whose job is to bring the herd to the barn or a wolf, whose task is to get the herd through the main gate.

The dog can bark, actracting sheeps towards it. The wolf, on the opposite, can howl, making the sheeps flee away.

But who is the good one and who is the bad one?

Controls: mouse and keyboard

Menu: mouse

Wolf Movement: WASD  Howl: C

Dog Movement: Arrows  Bark: L
